mapper.insert: insert into assignmentsubmissions (submission_id, student_id, teacher_id, assignment_name, submission_date, grade, submission_content) values (#{submission_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{student_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacher_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{assignment_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submission_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submission_content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update assignmentsubmissions set student_id = #{student_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacher_id = #{teacher_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assignment_name = #{assignment_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submission_date = #{submission_date,jdbcType=DATE}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submission_content = #{submission_content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where submission_id = #{submission_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select submission_id, student_id, teacher_id, assignment_name, submission_date, grade, submission_content from assignmentsubmissions where submission_id = #{submission_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select submission_id, student_id, teacher_id, assignment_name, submission_date, grade, submission_content from assignmentsubmissions
